comments:
Build ID: I20070608-1718

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Make a class which implements f.i. EditorPart
2. Try open this class in visual editor (right click on class->Open With->Visual Editor)



More information:
(This error exists in I20070608-1718 which is 3.3.RC4, but also in RC3 and RC2)

Visual editior is not opened and Eclipse reports error as follows:

An internal error occurred during: "Create Remote VM for Visual Editor for Java".
org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.PDECore.findPlugin(Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;I)Lorg/eclipse/pde/core/plugin/IPlugin;

and error log is as follows:
